Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This file contains the Game class, which contains the major gameplay elements of Wheel of Jeopardy. This handles all the interactions between the wheel and the board.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fiona Lyons

      This function has the basic functionality of answering a question
